profile.description:
Loloi Rugs is a young, family-owned company that designs truly original rugs and pillows for the trade. With all due respect to playing by the rules, sometimes you have got to push boundaries and create a style all your own. That's what we do with every forward-looking collection we create. Whether the style is cool and contemporary or elegant and traditional, the common thread in all our products is ingenuity.

• Ridiculously organized and deadline oriented.

profile.description:
PT. SMART Tbk. is a large and established group and major world player in agro-related industries and consumer goods under the umbrella of SINAR MAS GROUP - one of well establish conglomerate in Indonesia. (www.smart-tbk.com)


PT. SMART Tbk. ia an integrated palm-based consumer company that have owns and manages plantations, mills and refineries which manufacturated branded and unbranded cooking oil, branded margarine, fats and shortening. SMART's products are divided into three catagories : Retail, Industrial and Bulk.
We have a large oil palm plantations at Sumatera, Kalimantan , Papua, and our refineries located in Surabaya (Kawasan Rungkut Industri), Medan (Belawan), Kalimantan Selatan (Tarjun), Lampung (Tarahan) Bekasi (Marunda), Lubuk Gaung (Riau).
Our retail products are designed for household consumption. Whereas Industrial products are aimed at supplying noodle factories, confection factories, bakeries, fast food chains, hotels, hospitals, restaurant, and so forth.
The latter catagory fetches the premium gross margin as customer requirements are tailor-made to specifications.
profile.name: Sinarmas  Pte Ltd

profile.description: 20Fit is a microscale studio-gym that uses EMS technology and MihaBodytec equipments for your personal training experience. Our studio take advantage of cutting edge EMS technology that can give quick and maximum results. Every muscles group in your body will be simultaneously stimulated in short space of time intensively. Each typical training session is 20 minutes short and results is visible and sensible to our guests in only a month. Our vision is to be the biggest international brand of microstudio concept using innovation and technology while simultaneously make a healthier Indonesia in terms of fitness level and regular exercise habit.
profile.name: 20 Fit

profile.description:
Tata Consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that delivers real results to global business, ensuring a level of certainty no other firm can match. TCS offers a consulting-led, integrated portfolio of IT, BPS, infrastructure, engineering and assurance services. 


At TCS, we service a wide range of industry verticals, technology platforms, and business functions. This multifarious exposure provides you with growth opportunities at every step of your career. TCS lets you draw upon its superlative treasure of experience and expertise to add to yours. 


A part of the Tata group, India’s largest industrial conglomerate, TCS has over 276, 000 of the world’s best-trained consultants in 44 countries. The company generated consolidated revenues of US $11.6 billion for year ended March 31, 2013 and is listed on the National Stock Exchange and Bombay Stock Exchange in India. For more information,  
visit us at www.tcs.com
profile.name: Tata Consultancy Services

profile.description:
Datascrip adalah Perusahaan Marketing dan Distribusi, yang dikenal sebagai “ One Stop Bussiness Solution ”, beroperasi selama lebih dari 45 tahun dengan memiliki lebih dari 1000 karyawan. Circle K adalah toko ritel modern yang menjual jenis produk yang terbatas, bertempat di lokasi yang strategis dan nyaman dengan jam buka yang panjang. Hal ini menjadikannya popular di berbagai belahan dunia, termasuk di Indonesia dimana konsep convenience store seperti ini masih jarang.

Circle K menjadi trend-setter bagi banyak minimarket sejenis yang muncul kemudian hari. Saat ini Circle K populer di kalangan remaja kota besar di Indonesia. Circle K pertama kali hadir di Indonesia pada tahun 1986 di Indonesia tepatnya di kota Jakarta. Saat ini Circle K memiliki cabang di hampir setiap kota besar di seluruh Indonesia seperti di Bali, Yogyakarta, Bandung, Batam, Surabaya dan Makassar.

Selain di Indonesia, Circle K saat ini dapat dijumpai di Amerika Serikat, Meksiko, Jepang, Macau, China, Guam, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Uni Emirat Arab.
profile.name: Circle K

  • Advanced experience in building website and applications to specifications.

details.jobScope:
We are currently seeking for an innovative, driven, experienced .Net Developer to work with us in Bali, Indonesia.

He / she will need to collaborate and work with Bullseye development teams in Australia and Bali and need to be a team player and have a high attention to detail with good communication skills.

profile.description:
PT Bullseye is the Indonesian department of the exciting and innovative Australian Digital Agency, Ogilvy. Bullseye is an award-winning agency that develops online solutions for major clients such as Coca-Cola, Westpac Bank and Permata Bank.

 

Our company is one of the fastest growing agencies in Indonesia and provides an excellent opportunity for talented and career orientated web developers. Our goal is to employ the most talented people, to provide the best work environment and build excellent careers for our team members. We concentrate on providing an awesome work environment including training, Western management, English training and a billiards room for on-the-job satisfaction.

 

We have offices in Sydney, Melbourne, New Zealand and Indonesia. 

 

Check us out here: http://www.bullseye-digital.com/
profile.name: Bullseye

  • Komunikatif dan handal dalam negosiasi
details.jobScope:
• Memonitor, mengontrol, merencanakan dan mengevaluasi jalannya kegiatan bidang HRD
  • Merencanakan, mengevaluasi dan menganalisa Man Power Planning (MPP) disetiap Divisi agar efektifitas & efisien Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM) di perusahaan dapat dikendalikan dengan baik sesuai dengan tujuan perusahaan
  • Memonitor, mengontrol, merencanakan dan mengevaluasi jalannya kegiatan bidang pelatihan dan pengembangan SDM
  • Merencanakan, mengevaluasi dan menganalisa kebutuhan pelatihan SDM dan kinerja pelamar yang dapat diharapkan oleh user
  • Melaksanakan, memonitor, merencanakan dan mengevaluasi jalannya HRIS
  • Melaksanakan operational HRD secara keseluruhan

profile.description:
PT.BIRU FAST FOOD NUSANTARA is Indonesia's leading Restaurant Company with over 200 stores, and still growing. Over 5000 employes help ensure our Restaurants operate effectively so our customers get the service and products they deserve. Our restaurant brand – A&W Restaurants – is one of the global leaders of QSR food category.

At PT.BIRU FAST FOOD NUSANTARA, we like do things alittle differently. From our culture of fun and recognition to our focus on your career potential, we have actively developed a workforce that is diverse in style and background.

PT.BIRU FAST FOOD NUSANTARA is a place where anyone can, and does, make a difference.
profile.name: PT. Biru Fast Food Nusantara

details.requirements:
• Pria
  • Pendidikan min. D3 Informatika
  • Memahami dasar-dasar LAN Connectivity, (TCP / IP Ethernet), Desktop OS, Printer, Computer Hardware
  • Terbuka untuk fresh graduate, lebih diutamakan yang Berpengalaman Min. 1 tahun sebagai IT Support
  • Memiliki kemampuan analisa yang baik
  • Memiliki motivasi kerja yang baik dan komunikatif
  • Mampu bekerja secara Tim
  • Jujur, Bertanggung Jawab, Rajin, Serta memiliki Loyalitas
details.jobScope:
• Membantu Senior Support dalam menyelesaikan Trouble Hardware dan Software
  • Instalasi Jaringan (membuat jaringan baru serta melakukan perawatan jaringan)
  • Melakukan Koordinasi kerja dengan Senior Support
  • Melakukan Perbaikan dan penggantian part Hardware
  • Melaksanakan ISO di setiap Store baik dalam kota maupun luar kota, serta memberikan report hasil kerja.
  • Standby pada waktu tertentu (akhir pekan)
